abstract: Charles Strutt, official who has run Iowa's Powerball game since its inception in 1987, is removed from role as head of Multi-State Lottery Association by organization's board in midst of jackpot-fixing scandal.
lead_paragraph: An official who has run the Powerball game since its inception was removed from his post leading the Multi-State Lottery Association after a jackpot-fixing scandal grew.

headline.main: Iowa: Powerball Director Is Removed in Scandal
headline.print_headline: Iowa: Powerball Director Is Removed in Scandal

snippet: An official who has run the Powerball game since its inception was removed from his post leading the Multi-State Lottery Association after a jackpot-fixing scandal grew.
